# shopee-rate
---

### Rate props
| Property | Description | Type | Accepted Values | Default |
|:--|:--|:--|:--|:--|
| value | current value, use `v-model` to enable a two-way binding | Number | - | `0` |
| count | star count | Number | - | `5` |
| disabled | whether read only, unable to interact | Boolean | - | `false` |
| allow-half | whether to allow semi selection | Boolean | - | `false` |
| allow-decimal | whether to allow value to be any decimal, only effective when `disabled` is `true` | Boolean | - | `false` |
| clearable | whether allow to cancel the selection | Boolean | - | `flase` |
| show-text | whether to display a prompt text via the default slot | Boolean | - | `false` |
| icon | custom icon, accepts svg | String | - | - |
| character | custom character | String | - | - |

### Rate events
| Event | Description | Parameters |
|:--|:--|:--|
| change | trigger when the value change | `value` |
